name: Entei ex
author: PLANETA CG Works

abilities.name: Legendary Pulse
abilities.effect: At the end of your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, draw a card.

attacks.name: Blazing Beatdown
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {Fire} Energy attached, this attack does 60 more damage.

rule_box: ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent gets 2 points.
